name: cezerin2-monorepo
description: Cezerin2 is React and Node.js based eCommerce platform. https://cezerin.com

scripts.build: concurrently "cd cezerin2-admin && npm run build" "cd cezerin2-store && npm run build"
scripts.build:watch: concurrently "cd cezerin2-admin && npm run build:watch" "cd cezerin2-store && npm run build:watch"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd cezerin2 && pm2 start process.json" "cd cezerin2-admin && pm2 start process.json" "cd cezerin2-store && pm2 start process.json"
